name: Private Room by the Red Line!
description:
Awesome Private Room in a 2-Family house on the 1st floor sharing common areas with 2 students and/or professionals in a pleasant residential area, close to shops, food & restaurants within walking distance from the house on Dorchester Ave (“Dot” Ave); The house is 5 minutes Walk to the Red Line, a quick T ride to the financial districts, MGH, Boston Common, Hospitals: Beth Israel, Children, Brigham & Woman; MC of Arts, NEU, MIT, UMB & JFK Library, Harvard, & a bus ride to BU Medical Center.

The space
Also, there are Coin-Operated Washer and Dryer on the 2nd floor that can be used on Saturdays "Only" thru scheduled morning appointments with the host.
Washer = 8 Quarters
Dryer = 4 Quarters

Guest access
Guest has access to all common areas.

Other things to note
1) Please state your "Full Name" and the "Purpose of your Stay" when making your inquiry.
